decks.notes: The focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy by using a combination of removal spells, powerful creatures, and card manipulation. By utilizing efficient removal like Go for the Throat, along with evasive threats like Faerie Mastermind and Spyglass Siren, the deck aims to quickly take control of the game and maintain pressure on the opponent. Additionally, the inclusion of disruptive creatures like Mirrex and Tishana's Tidebinder provides further ways to disrupt the opponent's plans and secure victory through a combination of aggression and control.

This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and removal spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent while controlling the board. It aims to apply constant pressure with low-cost creatures like Deep-Cavern Bat and Preacher of the Schism, supported by removal spells like Go for the Throat and Legions to Ashes to clear the way. Liliana of the Veil provides additional disruption and card advantage, while Zoraline, Cosmos Caller and Aclazotz, Deepest Betrayal offer powerful late-game threats. The key strategy is to maintain a strong board presence and control the tempo of the game to secure a victory.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm opponents quickly with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By using a mix of creatures like Deep-Cavern Bat, Faerie Mastermind, and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor, along with spells like Duress and Phantom Interference, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage swiftly. With cards like Restless Reef and Go for the Throat providing additional support, this Dimir Aggro deck is designed to outpace opponents and secure victory through a combination of aggression and disruption.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with efficient creatures like Mosswood Dreadknight and Deep-Cavern Bat, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Liliana of the Veil and Vraska, Betrayal's Sting to maintain control of the battlefield. Sentinel of the Nameless City and Glissa Sunslayer provide additional aggressive threats, while cards like Tear Asunder and Duress help to handle problematic cards in the opponent's deck. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed, disruption, and powerful threats.

The primary focus of this Golgari Control deck is to utilize a combination of removal spells, graveyard manipulation, and creature control to outlast and overpower opponents. By using cards like Aftermath Analyst, Pillage the Bog, and Pitiless Carnage, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building up its own board presence with creatures like Iridescent Vinelasher and Lumra, Bellow of the Woods. Nissa, Resurgent Animist serves as a powerful planeswalker, providing additional mana and card advantage, while Escape Tunnel and Restless Cottage offer additional utility and protection for key creatures.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy. This is achieved by utilizing low-cost creatures like Imodane's Recruiter and Novice Inspector, as well as efficient removal spells like Gleeful Demolition. Resolute Reinforcements and Warleader's Call provide additional creatures to further pressure the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Mirrex and Sanguine Evangelist for added versatility and resilience. With a focus on early aggression and board presence, this deck aims to win the game quickly before the opponent can establish their own strategy.
